data.name: Dig 4 Destruction - Mask [Curse]
data.detailed_description:
The Cursed Ram mask has arrived!

By purchasing this DLC you will be able to use the 2 variations of the Cursed Ram mask.

Try on these unique masks and set yourself apart in battle!

Please update to the latest version of the game in order to purchase DLC
>Check Here
data.about_the_game:
The Cursed Ram mask has arrived!

By purchasing this DLC you will be able to use the 2 variations of the Cursed Ram mask.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX970、AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
